resources.string:
For any help and emergency, call at our help-line numbers:
 +91-9064916417
+91-8637366414

The Ranaghat Sarak Para Aatchala Society has introduced "Stay Home" app at this critical pandemic situation of corona virus, so as to keep the citizens to stay safe by staying home. We have a solution to all the worries at this lockdown period. One team will reach out to you for the fresh fruits and vegetables, groceries, sweets, and medicines at your door steps. We offer reasonable prices for each provided item in comparison to the marketplace and we also want that the customers should avoid going to the market rush and stay safe at the home. We will make sure to schedule the delivery according to the customer's convenience. Payment will be made by cash on delivery mode only. The items required by the customer but not listed at our app, can also be requested upon at our personal contact number. According to the availability, it will be provided likewise. 

"Our curfew, their doom"

	The daily wage workers have been mostly affected by the lockdown. They are without jobs and therefore without food for their family. So, Ranaghat Sarak Para Aatchala Society has come forward to feed the poors as their immune systems are not immune to hunger.
	At every transactions, a small portion of the money will be contributed for the welfare of the needy. Let us stay strong and united, but at the respective homes.
